data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: I am really hungry. I ____ eat a big ____! When ____ we ____ to ____ to ____? I can't wait ____ long ____ I ____ to ____ a ____ meal. I could eat an apple right now; that could help a little.
data.partBlankContent: I am really hungry. I co___ eat a big pi___! When a__ we go___ to g_ to din___? I can't wait ve__ long bef___ I ne__ to e__ a b__ meal. I could eat an apple right now; that could help a little.
data.fullContent: I am really hungry. I could eat a big pizza! When are we going to go to dinner? I can't wait very long before I need to eat a big meal. I could eat an apple right now; that could help a little.
data.answer: 我真的很饿。我可以吃一个大披萨!我们什么时候去吃饭?我等不及要吃一顿大餐了。我现在可以吃一个苹果;这可能有点帮助。
